title.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Jan. 21, 1868. Meeting of Saloonkeepers

div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Jan. 21, 1868. MEETING OF SALOONKEEPERS

body.p: The meeting which the saloonkeepers held yesterday for the purpose of adopting a constitution and electing officers was well attended. The committee, which had been appointed to draft a constitution, submitted one. After each paragraph had been read and accepted, the entire constitution was unanimously adopted. Then, election of officers was the order of the day, with the following result:
Trustees: V. Knobloch, B. Armbruster, F. Rettig.
Aid Committee: W. Jung, Franz Koerner, H. Mehring, J. Nipsel, L. F. Metz.
